headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Triple Rewards on the Halloween Bunker Series, 2X GTA$ and RP on Halloween-themed Modes, and More
content:
Make the most of a bleak scenario by taking advantage of Triple Rewards on the entire Halloween Bunker Series, featuring a grim trio of Slasher maps that take place in the guts of the Bunker, Missile Base, and The Diamond Casino & Resort.

Also, youâ€™ll still earn 2X GTA$ and RP on all the grisliest Halloween-themed activities, including Come Out to Play, Condemned, select Slasher maps, and Alien Survivals.
